God loves us even as He loves His Son, and Christ has given us the assurance, "I will not leave you comfortless: I will come to you." Let us have 


                                  -173- 

many, many love feasts over this assurance, knowing that Christ is ever beside us, to strengthen and to bless.--Ms 139, 1902. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. Dec. 17, 1987. Entire Ms.
